data.message: https://youtu.be/y-28jtVHYVU this man murdered my father and talked bad about YOU on his Facebook please watch and share this video.

replies.message: I watched it... Im so sorry. 😢
Sara Vandenberg Boc thank you for watching. I appreciate it

I just watched your Mother's amazing video, wow! Not only has she been through hell already, but to have this thing released from prison, then "write" its version of events, rubbishing everything about your Father, her knight in shining armour, is evil enough, but to have the media and Oprah empathise with this thing could only have one outcome- your dear Mother's destruction! I will pray for her and you and your family, can I say God cries when we cry, God hurts when we hurt and He says, "Vengeance is mine". I know this thing, Oprah and everyone involved with him will pay and their payment will be high. God bless
